# Introduction
This is to learn and test the cluster without using the build-in package

# Cluster = 3, SPECIES
## default k
(k=level of unique variables)
```{r}
clustertable(df, original=ddt, name = "SPECIES")
```
## assigned K
```{r}
clustertable(df, original=ddt, k=7, name = "SPECIES")
```

# Cluster = 5, SPECIES
```{r}
clustertable(df, original=ddt, k=5, name = "SPECIES")
```

# Cluster = 3, RIVER
```{r}
clustertable(df, original=ddt, name = "RIVER")
```
